lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama is honoring actors Robert DeNiro, Cicely Tyson, Tom Hanks and Robert Redford with the nation's highest civilian honor.

headline.main: Top US Civilian Honor Going to 21 Artists, Athletes, Others
